column5: My place is close to All the shopping centers and grocery stores including Home Depot. The recreation center is up the street on parkerville. All the restaurants are within two miles from my house on beltline road. Lovefield Airport is 25 minutes going downtown, DFW Airport is about 35 minutes from my area. . Youâ€™ll love my place because of It has that country feel, The comfy bed, the coziness, the high ceilings. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
